main event: Mrs. [REDACTED] reported observing six flying discs or saucers between 2100 and 2200 on 31 July 1949 in Portsmouth, Virginia.
interesting points: The objects first appeared as a small white cloud, then took the form of a tulip, and later changed to the shape of a saucer before disappearing., The sightings occurred in the vicinity of the U.S. Naval Hospital., The first two saucers appeared very close together, with the rest appearing one to one and one-half minutes apart., The observation lasted for about 5 to 6 minutes in total., The color of the saucers was described as dull white.
witness description: Mrs. [REDACTED] and Mrs. [REDACTED], both residents of an apartment house in Portsmouth.
